message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CV, cs.CL. 

The paper proposes a new method for improving the performance of recurrent neural networks in learning temporal representations of time series. This falls under the broad category of machine learning, specifically deep learning, which is covered by cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The method involves adapting the scales of the network based on different temporal contexts, which is related to the field of neural networks and their architectures, covered by cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing). The experiments involve multiple sequence modeling tasks, which could be related to computer vision (cs.CV) or natural language processing (cs.CL).
